articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: European leaders decry Elon Musk's meddling - DW (English)
articles.description: Germany has said that Musk's attempts to influence the coming German election are futile as the Tesla CEO voices support for the far right. The UK's Starmer and France's Macron echoed the German government's sentiments.
articles.content:
Elon Musk does not hold the kind of sway over German voters that recent hand-wringing would imply, the government of German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Monday.
"The normal people, the sensible pe… [+2440 chars]
